sen.j: 眞子内親王は、日本の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Mako is a member of Imperial family of Japan.
Imperial Princess Mako is a member of Imperial family of Japan.

sen.j: 秋篠宮文仁親王の第一女子の眞子内親王（まこないしんのう、平成3年（1991年）10月23日 -）。
sen.e: Born on October 23, 1991 as the first daughter of Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya Fumihito.
Born on October 23, 1991 as the first daughter of Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya Fumihito.

sen.j: 仁明天皇の皇女の眞子内親王（さねこないしんのう、生年不詳 - 貞観 (日本)12年5月5日 (旧暦)（870年6月7日））。

sen.j: 母は更衣 (女官)・紀種子。
sen.e: Her mother was KI no Taneko, a koi or nyokan (a lady waiting in the court).
Her mother was KI no Taneko, a koi or nyokan (a lady waiting in the court).

sen.j: 眞子内親王（まこないしんのう、1991年10月23日 -）は、日本の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Mako (born on October 23, 1991) is a member of Imperial family of Japan.

sen.j: 秋篠宮文仁親王と文仁親王妃紀子の第一女子。
sen.e: the first daughter between Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya and his wife Princess Kiko.
the first daughter between Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya and his wife Princess Kiko.

sen.j: 明仁の孫にあたる。

sen.j: 身位は内親王。
sen.e: The imperial rank is Naishinno (Imperial Princess)

sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。

sen.j: 皇室典範における敬称は殿下。
sen.e: The honorific for her in Imperial House Act is "denka (her Highness.)"
The honorific for her in the Imperial House Act is "denka (her Highness.)"
The honorific for her in the Imperial House Act is "denka" (her Highness).

sen.j: お印は木香茨（もっこうばら）。
sen.e: The symbol of her is Mokkobara (banksia rose.)

sen.j: 妹に佳子内親王、弟に悠仁親王がいる。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Kako is her younger sister and Imperial Prince Hisahito her younger brother
Imperial Princess Kako is her younger sister and Imperial Prince Hisahito her younger brother

sen.j: 略歴

sen.j: 平成3年（1991年）10月23日、宮内庁病院にて誕生。
sen.e: Born on October 23, 1991 in the Imperial Household Hospital
Born on October 23, 1991 in the Imperial Household Hospital
Born on October 23, 1991 in the Imperial Household Hospital.
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。

sen.j: 同日、皇室の儀式。
sen.e: On the same day the ceremony of Imperial family was celebrated.
On the same day the ceremony of the Imperial family was celebrated.
On the same day the ceremony of the Imperial family was celebrated.

sen.j: この時に明仁から授けられた守り刀は、重要無形文化財保持者（人間国宝）に認定された隅谷正峯の作。
sen.e: The mamorigatana (the sword for protection) given by Emperor Fumihito on the ceremony was made by Masamine SUMITANI, the holder of certified Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure.)

The mamorigatana (the sword for protection) given by Emperor Fumihito on the ceremony was made by Masamine SUMITANI, the holder of certified Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure.)

The mamorigatana (the sword for protection) given by Emperor Akihito on the ceremony was made by Masamine SUMITANI, the holder of certified Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
sen.cmt: Emperor Akihitoに訂正しました。ピリオド訂正しました。

sen.j: 同年10月29日、命名の儀。
sen.e: On October 29 in the same year of her birth, Meimei no gi (the naming ceremony)
On October 29 in the same year of her birth, Meimei no gi (the naming ceremony)
On October 29 in the same year of her birth, Meimei no gi (the naming ceremony)

sen.j: 父の秋篠宮文仁親王により、「眞子」と名付けられる。
sen.e: She was named "Mako" by her father, Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya
She was named "Mako" by her father, Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya
She was named 'Mako' by her father, Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya.
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。ピリオド訂正しました。

sen.j: この名は、「天性のものを失わず自然に、飾ることなく、ありのままに人生を歩む」願いを込めて命名された。
sen.e: The name was given in the hope that "She will go through her life as she is without losing her gift and showing vanity."
The name was given in the hope that "She will go through her life as she is without losing her gift and showing vanity."
The name was given in the hope that 'She will go through her life as she is without losing her gift and showing vanity.'
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。

sen.j: 平成10年（1998年）4月、学習院初等科入学。
sen.e: entered Gakushuin Primary School in April, 1998.
entered Gakushuin Primary School in April, 1998.
entered Gakushuin Primary School in April, 1998.
sen.cmt: Entered 大文字にしました。

sen.j: 平成16年（2004年）3月、学習院初等科卒業。
sen.e: graduated from the school in March, 2004.
graduated from the school in March, 2004.
Graduated from the school in March, 2004.

sen.j: 同年4月、学習院女子中等科入学。
sen.e: entered Gakushuin Girls' Junior High school in the same year.
entered Gakushuin Girls' Junior High school in the same year.
Entered Gakushuin Girls' Junior High school in the same year.
sen.cmt: Entered 大文字にしました。

sen.j: 平成18年（2006年）8月、2週間に渡ってオーストリアにホームステイをした。
sen.e: In 2008, she stayed a family in Austria for two weeks.
In 2008, she stayed with a family in Austria for two weeks.
In 2008, she stayed with a family in Austria for two weeks.

sen.j: ホームステイ先は母・紀子妃の知人宅であった。
sen.e: The family she stayed was one of her mother Imperial Princess Kiko's acquaintances.
The family she stayed with was one of her mother Imperial Princess Kiko's acquaintances.
The family she stayed with was one of her mother Imperial Princess Kiko's acquaintances.

sen.j: 平成19年（2007年）3月、学習院女子中等科卒業。
sen.e: In 2007, graduated from Gakushuin Girls' Junior High School.
In 2007, graduated from Gakushuin Girls' Junior High School.
In 2007, graduated from Gakushuin Girls' Junior High School.

sen.j: 同年4月、学習院女子高等科入学。
sen.e: In April of the same year, she entered Gakushuin Girls' Senior High School.
In April of the same year, she entered Gakushuin Girls' Senior High School.
In April of the same year, she entered Gakushuin Girls' Senior High School.

sen.j: 平成17年（2005年）頃からは、日本国内を中心として両親の公務、接見に同行・同座することが多くなり、最年長の内親王として国民の前に姿を現す機会も増えている。
sen.e: Starting around in 2005, there have been increasing chances of her appearing in public as an Imperial princess by accompanying her parents' doing public services, most of which are centered in Japan.
Starting around 2005, there have been increasing chances of her appearing in public as Imperial princess by accompanying her parents' doing public services, most of which are centered in Japan.
Starting around 2005, there have been increasing chances of her appearing in public as Imperial Princess by accompanying her parents' doing public services, most of which are centered in Japan.

sen.j: 平成18年（2006年）には父・秋篠宮文仁親王の三重県訪問に同行し伊勢神宮神宮式年遷宮の行事「神宮式年遷宮御木曳行事」を視察し、自ら行事に参加した。
sen.e: In 2006, the princess accompanied her father Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya Fumihito when he visited Mie Prefecture and she observed and participated in "Okihikigyoji (the event to carry the lumbers into the reconstruction site)," one of the events in Jingu Shikinen Sengu (the event to reconstruct shrine building every 20 years) of Ise Shrine.

In 2006, the princess accompanied her father Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya Fumihito when he visited Mie Prefecture and she observed and participated in "Okihikigyoji (the event to carry the lumber into the reconstruction site)," one of the events in Jingu Shikinen Sengu (the event to reconstruct a shrine building every 20 years) of Ise Shrine.

In 2006, the princess accompanied her father Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya Fumihito when he visited Mie Prefecture and she observed and participated in 'Okihikigyoji' (the event to carry the lumber into the reconstruction site), one of the events in Jingu Shikinen Sengu (the event to reconstruct a shrine building every 20 years) of Ise Shrine.
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。

sen.j: 平成20年（2008年）からは単独公務も開始している。
sen.e: In 2008 she started her solo public services by herself.
In 2008 she started her solo public services by herself.
In 2008 she started her solo public services by herself.

sen.j: 明仁の初孫であるため、幼年期は報道、ワイドショーへの露出も多かった。
sen.e: She was often reported by the press and tabloid TV shows at her infancy because she is the first grandson of Emperor Akihitor.
She was often reported by the press and tabloid TV shows at her infancy because she is the first granddaughter of Emperor Akihitor.
She was often reported by the press and tabloid TV shows at her infancy because she is the first granddaughter of Emperor Akihito.

sen.j: また、この時期は警備にも多数の人員が割かれていたという。
sen.e: Also, it is said that at this period increased security personnel were mobilized.
Also, it is said that during this period increased security personnel were mobilized.
Also, it is said that during this period increased security personnel were mobilized.

sen.j: 平成5年（1993年）夏、軽井沢静養の折り大型犬が紀子妃に抱かれた眞子内親王の眼前まで飛び上がり、驚いた飼い主に対し紀子妃が「お友だちになりたいのね」と咄嗟にフォローしたことがある。
sen.e: In summer of 1993 at the rest in Karuizawa, there was a surprising episode that a large-sized dog suddenly jumped to just before the eyes of Princess Mako held in the arms of her mother (Princess Kiko), but she used her wit to get through the situation by saying to the surprised dong's owner "Oh, the dog wants to be my friend."

In the summer of 1993 while resting in Karuizawa, there was a surprising episode where a large-sized dog suddenly jumped just before the eyes of Princess Mako held in the arms of her mother (Princess Kiko), but she used her wit to get through the situation by saying to the surprised dog's owner "Oh, the dog wants to be my friend."

In the summer of 1993 while resting in Karuizawa, there was a surprising episode where a large-sized dog suddenly jumped just before the eyes of Princess Mako held in the arms of her mother (Princess Kiko), but she used her wit to get through the situation by saying to the surprised dog's owner 'Oh, the dog wants to be my friend.'
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。

sen.j: この犬とは翌年以降も交流が続いた。
sen.e: She continued meeting the dog the following years.
She continued meeting the dog the following years.
She continued meeting the dog the following years.

sen.j: 平成7年（1995年）5月、葉山静養の折り、海岸で眞子内親王が海蛇に関心を示し父・秋篠宮にしきりに尋ねる映像がある。
sen.e: There is a video clip that at the rest in Hayama (in Kanagawa Prefecture) she took an interest in sea snakes and asked her father Akishinonomiya many times about them.
There is a video clip during their rest in Hayama (in Kanagawa Prefecture) she took an interest in sea snakes and asked her father Akishinonomiya many times about them.
There is a video clip during their rest in Hayama (in Kanagawa Prefecture) she took an interest in sea snakes and asked her father Akishinonomiya many times about them.

sen.j: 幼少時のエピソードの中でも有名なもので、皇室特番・ニュースでも頻繁に紹介されている。
sen.e: This is one of the most popular episodes at her infancy and it has been often reported by special TV programs and news.
This is one of the most popular episodes in her infancy and it has been often reported by special TV programs and news.
This is one of the most popular episodes in her infancy and it has been often reported by special TV programs and news.

sen.j: 美術、古文書、建築物などに関心がある。
sen.e: She is interested in art, ancient documents and architecture.
She is interested in art, ancient documents and architecture.
She is interested in art, ancient documents and architecture.

sen.j: 特に日本画に関心が深く、学習院初等科を卒業した時の作文には正倉院、唐招提寺、京都御所において美術を鑑賞し、奈良鳥類研究所において鳥を描く際の心得についての指導を受けた出来事が記されている。
sen.e: She is especially interested in Japanese style painting and on the occasion of her graduation from Gakushuin Primary School she wrote an essay to the effect that she had enjoyed looking at art works in Shosoin Treasure Repository, Toshodaiji Temple and Kyoto Imperial Palace, and in the essay she also wrote about her experience of being instructed on hints about drawing birds at Nara Institute for Ornithology.

She is especially interested in Japanese style painting and on the occasion of her graduation from Gakushuin Primary School she wrote an essay to the effect that she had enjoyed looking at art work in the Shosoin Treasure Repository, Toshodaiji Temple, and the Kyoto Imperial Palace, and in the essay she also wrote about her experience of being instructed on hints about drawing birds at the Nara Institute for Ornithology.

She is especially interested in Japanese style painting and on the occasion of her graduation from Gakushuin Primary School she wrote an essay to the effect that she had enjoyed looking at art work in the Shosoin Treasure Repository, Toshodai-ji Temple, and the Kyoto Imperial Palace, and in the essay she also wrote about her experience of being instructed on hints about drawing birds at the Nara Institute for Ornithology.
sen.cmt: Toshodai-ji Templeハイフン補足しました、

sen.j: 同作文においては、修復技術への関心もうかがわせた。
sen.e: The essay also offered a glimpse of her interest in the restoration techniques.
The essay also offered a glimpse of her interest in restoration techniques.
The essay also offered a glimpse of her interest in restoration techniques.
sen.cmt: スペース削除しました。

sen.j: 皇后美智子の手がける養蚕を、母・文仁親王妃紀子や妹・佳子内親王と共に手伝っている。
sen.e: She helps Empress with her silk cultivation, which the empress is engaged in, with her mother Princess Kiko (the wife of Prince Akishinonomiya) and her younger sister Princess Kako.
She helps the Empress with her silk cultivation, which the empress is engaged in, with her mother Princess Kiko (the wife of Prince Akishinonomiya) and her younger sister Princess Kako.
She helps the Empress with her silk cultivation, which the empress is engaged in, with her mother Princess Kiko (the wife of Prince Akishinonomiya) and her younger sister Princess Kako.

sen.j: 皇后御親蚕において小石丸から採取された糸から作られた絹は皇族が儀式に用いる着物に用いられ、内親王も瑞獣であるツルをあしらった晴れ着を着用した。
sen.e: The silk clothes made of the thread taken from koishimaru (a kind of silkworm) are used for the kimono (Japanese traditional dress) that members of Imperial families wear at the imperial ceremonies, and the Princess wore haregi (the festive kimono) on which zuiju (lucky animals) are featured.

The silk clothes made of the thread taken from koishimaru (a kind of silkworm) are used for the kimono (Japanese traditional dress) that members of Imperial families wear at imperial ceremonies, and the Princess wore haregi (the festive kimono) on which zuiju (lucky animals) are featured.

The silk clothes made of the thread taken from koishimaru (a kind of silkworm) are used for the kimono (Japanese traditional dress) that members of Imperial families wear at imperial ceremonies, and the Princess wore haregi (the festive kimono) on which zuiju (lucky animals) are featured.

sen.j: 同様に平成8年（1996年）から、妹とともに祖父・今上天皇の稲作も手伝っている。
sen.e: Besides the cultivation she started to help the present Emperor with his rice crop together with her younger sister from 1996.
sen.cmt: Emperor大文字にしました。from 1996補足。

sen.j: インターネット上での人気が高く、話題となったことがある。
sen.e: There was an episode which came up in gossip on the Internet.
There was an episode that resulted in gossip on the Internet.
There was an episode that resulted in gossip on the Internet.

sen.j: ジャニーズ事務所のファンと言われ、そのコンサートに行ったとするゴシップ記事が掲載されたこともあったが、平成20年（2008年）9月26日になって、テレビ番組での報道と併せ、コンサートに行った事実が宮内庁発表により否定された。
sen.e: A gossip article appeared in a magazine and TV new shows that Princess Mako was a great fan of the star belonging to Johnny's (an idols office) and went to the star's concert, but both the Imperial Household Agency and a TV program denied the claim on September 26 of her going to the concert.

sen.j: 名前についての備考
sen.e: Notes for her name
Notes about her name

sen.j: 報道などでは「秋篠宮眞子」と呼称されることが多いが、公式には宮家の当主ではないため「秋篠宮」の宮号は冠せず「眞子内親王」と称するのが正しい。
sen.e: The princess is often called "Akishinonomiya Mako" by the media, but officially it is right to call her "Mako Naishinno (Imperial Princess Mako)" because she is not the head of Miyake (a family allowed to be in status of Imperial family).

The princess is often called "Akishinonomiya Mako" by the media, but officially it is proper to call her "Mako Naishinno" (Imperial Princess Mako) because she is not the head of Miyake (a family allowed to be in status of the Imperial family).

The princess is often called 'Akishinonomiya Mako' by the media, but officially it is proper to call her 'Mako Naishinno' (Imperial Princess Mako) because she is not the head of Miyake (a family allowed to be in status of the Imperial family).
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。

sen.j: 但し自署においても「秋篠宮眞子内親王」とした例がある。
sen.e: However, in some cases the princess used "Akishinonomiya Mako Naishinno" as her own signature.
However, in some cases the princess used "Akishinonomiya Mako Naishinno" as her own signature.
However, in some cases the princess used 'Akishinonomiya Mako Naishinno' as her own signature.
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。

sen.j: なお、新字体による「真子」の表記は、通俗用法としても用いられる例は見られない。
sen.e: In addition, the examples of using the expression "真子 (Mako)" by the simplified Chinese characters for "眞子"have not been found even in popular style.
